name: .UCCAPILOG File Extension
summary: Learn about .UCCAPILOG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Log file created by Microsoft programs that use the Microsoft Unified Communications Client API (UCCAPI); contains troubleshooting and debugging information that logs the performance of a UCCAPI program; may be appended with new data during program execution.

content: Developers use the Microsoft-specified file naming convention appName-UccApi-x.uccapilog, where "appName" is the program name and "x" is the log file number. Typically UCCAPILOG files are found within a "Tracing" folder under a user's home folder.
Windows Live Messenger is a common program that uses UCCAPILOG files. WindowsLiveMessenger-uccapi-0.uccapilog is a common log file created by Windows Live Messenger.
NOTE: Windows Live Messenger was discontinued in 2013 and has moved to Skype.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
